title.en: Moratta Mittsu no Hazure Skill, Awasetara Saikyou Deshita

altTitles.ja: 貰った三つの外れスキル、合わせたら最強でした

altTitles.en: The Three Skills I Received, When Combined, Were The Most Powerful

altTitles.id: Tiga keterampilan tidak biasa yang saya terima adalah yang terkuat jika digabungkan.

altTitles.pt-br: As Três Habilidades que Recebi, Quando Combinadas, Eram as Mais Poderosas

description.en:
Mutou Kushina's life, filled with brutality, came to an abrupt end. In his new incarnation, the goddess granted him three abilities: [Super Speedy Regeneration], [Agelessness], and [Grit: Indomitable Spirit]. However, those skills were outlier skills that were not offensive skills!

The place where he was reborn with such skills is the Forest of Endless Calamity, where a large number of Danger Level S monsters roam, one of which is capable of destroying the world. Having no offensive skills, Kushina's should have been killed by the monsters right away, but...? With all three skills, he can instantly regenerate no matter what kind of attack he receives! And every time he is attacked, he gets stronger and stronger...
description.ja:
壮絶な前世の末、命を落とした少年・無倒屈止無（むとう くしな）。転生する際に女神に貰ったのは【超速再生】【不老】【根性：不撓不屈】という３つのスキル。しかし、それらのスキルは攻撃系のスキルではない外れスキルだった！

そんなスキルを持って転生した先は、“危険度S”の1匹で世界を滅ぼせる程のモンスターが大量に闊歩している【果ての災厄の森】。攻撃系のスキルを持たない屈止無はすぐにモンスターに殺されるはずだったが……？３つのスキルを組み合わせたらどんな攻撃を受けても瞬時に再生！しかも攻撃される度に強くなっていき―
description.pt-br: Mutou Kushina, após uma vida brutal, é reencarnado por uma deusa em um mundo cheio de monstros de Nível de Perigo S. Com habilidades aparentemente inúteis - [Regeneração Super Rápida], [Imortalidade] e [Determinação: Espírito Indomável] - ele deveria ter sido morto imediatamente. No entanto, essas habilidades permitem que ele se regenere instantaneamente e fique mais forte a cada ataque. Agora, ele deve enfrentar os desafios da Floresta das Calamidades Infinitas e descobrir seu verdadeiro potencial.
